name: Ambuscading Spell
text: Your spells are particularly effective against those caught unawares.
benefit: During a surprise round, your opponents that have not yet acted take a –2 penalty on saving throws against spells you cast. Creatures that have already acted take a –1 penalty during the surprise round.
text_zh: 你的魔法在打击那些浑然不觉的目标时特别有效。
benefit_zh: 当处于突袭轮时，你的对手会在对抗你的法术效果的豁免检定上承受-2减值；即使这些生物已经行动过，它们也会在对抗你的法术效果的豁免检定上承受-1减值。
